fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Talk with an Authorized target at night and determine if they appear suspicious or not, following the same rules as TOS Sheriff.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If this rolls, 1353 Walkie must roll as well.
- You will know 1353 Walkie's name and have a private chat with them that will remain as long as you both are alive.
- If 1353 Walkie dies, you will only have one use left of your ability. If they get revived, you will have unlimited uses again.
- You cannot target yourself.
- You are immune to conversion.
- Detection Vulnerability: If someone investigates you, their results will be based on a random evil role from a faction that exists in this game, determined when the game starts. It must be from the same faction as 1353 Walkie's disguise. You won't know what that role is.
